A2 the number 70: sixty-nine, seventy, seventy-one This house was built seventy years ago.
More examplesFewer examplesAt seventy, he still retains his impish grin.They nicked him for driving at seventy in a fifty speed limit area.At seventy she was surprisingly broadminded.
